TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ObjectSelectorEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

Docs.summary: Implements the basic functionality that can be used to design value editors. These editors can, in turn, provide a user interface for representing and editing the values of objects of the supported data types.

Docs.param: An that can be used to gain additional context information.
An <xref:System.IServiceProvider> that this editor can use to obtain services.
Docs.summary: Edits the value of the specified object using the editor style indicated by <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ObjectSelectorEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>.
Docs.returns: The new value of the object. If the value of the object has not changed, the method should return the same object it was passed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A service provider is provided so that the editor can obtain any required services.

Docs.value: The new value of the object. If the value of the object has not changed, the method should return the same object it was passed.
